WorkItem.Description:
I'm using the 4.0.17 pre-alpha version of rawr. I've been unable to load my characters from the battle.net armory. I am able to load my characters with a previous version of rawr (version 2.3.22). Unfortunately, the previous version I have doesn't support level 85 characters or the equipment they have. There's also no suggested fix when I got the error. 
 
== Error Message ==
Could not load file or assembly 'System.Web, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a' or one of its dependencies. The system cannot find the file specified.
 
== StackTrace ==

WorkItem.Summary: Unable to load a character from Battle.net armory

Comments.Message: Sorry about that. I found the post with the same issue. Updating .NET did the trick.
